title: So i wasted 2 champ skins for 1 ward skin and nothing...

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: The ward name was strange but still i made it perma but it doesnt show wtf ? 2 Skins wasted nice + Ward skin nice nice ...

replies.body: This is actually the result of a known issue with some ward skins, and they're not selectable in-game even if it's unlocked on the account.  There's not eta at the moment, but I looked into this for you and confirmed that the gingerbread ward is on the account.  Hope that helps!
